Tolkien-related events that took place in 1898.

content.title: May
content.content: 8 - Vera Chapman, who will later found The Tolkien Society, is born.

content.title: November
content.content:
9 - Owen Barfield, Inkling, is born.
29 - C.S. Lewis, who will play an immense part in the development of J.R.R. Tolkien's works, is born.
